description.para: Convert integer to decimal digit literals.
Convert integer to hex digit literals.

detaileddescription.para: Bits 16 to 32 = major version. Bits 8 to 16 = minor version. Bits 0 to 8 = point release.

memberdef.name: CXXWIN_VERSION_ID
memberdef.initializer: [[maybe_unused]] volatile auto CxxWinVersionId = "cxxwin_version_" STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_MAJOR) "_" STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_MINOR) "_" STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_PATCH);

memberdef.name: CXXWIN_LONG_NAME
memberdef.initializer: TEXT("CxxWin") STRINGIFY(.) STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_MAJOR) STRINGIFY(.) STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_MINOR) STRINGIFY(.) STRINGIFY(CXXWIN_VERSION_PATCH)

briefdescription.para: Contains some standard definitions, functions, and includes familiar to all supported platforms and architectures.
If the compiler does not have __has_*(), pretend the answer is always no.
Helper macro to quote an argument, turning it into a string.
Quote the argument, turning it into a string.
Helper macro to concatenate two tokens to form a new token.
Concatenate two tokens to form a new token.
